rules_text: Tap up to two target creatures and put a stun counter on each of them. Create two Junk tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“Oh, oh, watch them grow! Why, they might just reach the stars themselves.”
—Doc Clementine “Cogs” Faraday[/i]
